类 OODesign.GUI.TextArea
的使用

  • 使用TextArea的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    OODesign.GUI
    This package provide the basic GUI elements of java file generator
    OODesign.logic
    This package provides the logic part of java file generator

    • OODesign.GUI中TextArea的使用

      返回TextArea的OODesign.GUI中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      TextArea SubWindow.gettextArea1()
      this method returns the textArea1 which contains the class name
      TextArea SubWindow.gettextArea2()
      this method returns the textArea2 which contains the class attributes
      TextArea SubWindow.gettextArea3()
      this method returns the textArea3 which contains the class methods
      参数类型为TextArea的OODesign.GUI中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MiddlePanel(TextArea textArea1, javax.swing.JPanel panel0, javax.swing.JFrame frame, java.lang.String s1)
      initial the parameter

    • OODesign.logic中TextArea的使用

      参数类型为TextArea的OODesign.logic中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ClassAttributes.setAttributes(TextArea textArea2)
      this method set the input attributes and store them into the ArrayList
      void ClassMethods.setMethods(TextArea textArea3)
      this method set the input methods and store them into the ArrayList
      void ClassName.setName(TextArea textArea1)
      this method set the input name and store them into the ArrayList
      参数类型为TextArea的OODesign.logic中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JavaClass(TextArea ta, ClassModifier cmf, ClassName cnm, ClassAttributes cab, ClassMethods cmd, java.lang.String type)
      this constructor get the input message from the array list
      JavaFile(TextArea ta, ClassModifier cmf, ClassName cnm, ClassAttributes cab, ClassMethods cmd, java.lang.String type)
      this constructor get the content of java file
